GOVERNANCE 
& ETHICS
Inspired by our values, we celebrate a corporate 
culture that’s built on honesty, consistency, and a 
persistent drive to be better. 
Governance and Ethics at KLA is more than 
policymaking or having the right systems in 
place to establish the rights of our people and 
the responsibilities of our leadership. We view 
Governance and Ethics as an opportunity to 
continuously embrace our core values, build trust, 
and live up to our stakeholders’ expectations.
